{{cpp/io/basic_ostream/title|seekp}}
{{cpp/io/basic_ostream/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|1=
basic_ostream&amp; seekp( pos_type pos );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|1=
basic_ostream&amp; seekp( off_type off, std::ios_base::seekdir dir );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Sets the output position indicator of the current associated {{tt|streambuf}} object. 

{{rrev|since=c++11|
Behaves as {{named req|UnformattedOutputFunction}} (except without actually performing output). After constructing and checking the sentry object, 
}}

@1@ if {{c|1=fail() != true}}, sets the output position indicator to absolute (relative to the beginning of the file) value {{c|pos}} by calling {{c|rdbuf()-&gt;pubseekpos(pos, std::ios_base::out)}}. In case of failure, calls {{c|setstate(std::ios_base::failbit)}}.
@2@ if {{c|1=fail() != true}}, sets the output position indicator to offset {{c|off}} relative to {{c|dir}} by calling {{c|rdbuf()-&gt;pubseekoff(off, dir, std::ios_base::out)}}. In case of failure, calls {{c|setstate(std::ios_base::failbit)}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|pos|absolute position to set the output position indicator to}}
{{par|off|relative position (positive or negative) to set the output position indicator to}}
{{par|dir|defines base position to apply the relative offset to. It can be one of the following constants:
{{cpp/io/ios_base/seekdir consts}}}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|*this}}

===Exceptions===
@1,2@ May throw {{lc|std::ios_base::failure}} in case of failure, if {{c|1=exceptions() &amp; failbit != 0}}.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;sstream&gt;

int main()
{
    std::ostringstream os("hello, world");
    os.seekp(7);
    os &lt;&lt; 'W';
    os.seekp(0, std::ios_base::end);
    os &lt;&lt; '!';
    os.seekp(0);
    os &lt;&lt; 'H';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; os.str() &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
Hello, World!
}}
